historical:
Prior Codifications

1981 Ed., § 1-2295.14.

Emergency Act Amendments

For temporary amendment of section, see § 2001(d) of the Fiscal Year 1999 Budget Support Emergency Act of 1998 (D.C. Act 12-401, July 13, 1998, 45 DCR 4794), and see § 2001(d) of the Fiscal Year 1999 Budget Support Congressional Review Emergency Act of 1998 (D.C. Act 12-564, January 12, 1999, 46 DCR 669).

For temporary (90-day) amendment of section, see § 2001(d) of the Fiscal Year 1999 Budget Support Congressional Review Emergency Act of 1999 (D.C. Act 13-41, March 31, 1999, 46 DCR 3446).

For temporary (90-day) amendment of section, see § 1102(e) of the Service Improvement and Fiscal Year 2000 Budget Support Emergency Act of 1999 (D.C. Act 13-110, July 28, 1999, 46 DCR 6320).

Legislative History of Laws

For legislative history of D.C. Law 12-144, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 2-1219.01

For legislative history of D.C. Law 12-175, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 2-1203.01.

For Law 13-38, see notes following § 2-1205.01.

For Law 17-138, see notes following § 2-1219.01.

DC CODE § 2-1219.14

Current through December 11, 2012
